text.author: Wikinews
text.title: Wikinews interviews academic Simon Licen about attitudes towards US Paralympics
text.summary: In an interview with Wikinews, Simon Ličen, Assistant Professor in Educational Leadership, Sport Studies and Psychology at Washington State University, talks about the upcoming 2014 Winter Paralympics in Sochi, Russia, as well as the reasons for negative attitudes to the paralympics and challenges in media coverage for paralympics.
